entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h this morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 54 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
